title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 131.1 - Scope of rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 131.1 - Scope of rules and regulations

State Regulations

The rules and regulations of this Part apply to utility
facilities located within State highway rights-of-way and those utility
facilities that affect the use and operation of State highway facilities. In
addition, this Part is applicable to other highways in which Federal laws or
regulations require such compliance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
131.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
